content: You are right. In today's fast-paced world, adapting to new changes and learning new skills has become more critical than ever. However, in the process of seeking new knowledge, we often overlook the wisdom that our elders and mentors have gained through their experiences. It is essential to recognize and value the importance of mentorship and guidance in our lives, which can help us steer through our personal and professional challenges. We need to acknowledge the importance of our elders and mentors and learn from their knowledge and experiences, which can help us become better individuals and leaders in our respective fields.
